TopicTitle: Need Maneuver Node Timer and Delta/V data in IVA view

Articles.Content:
I love flying IVA but i can never do it as often as I would like due to the lack of information. It would be great if the default IVA views included a small readout to let you know your status in relation to active maneuver nodes.

I know there may be mods that do this but it would great to have it stock.

I know there may be mods that do this

Is there??
Not that i could find. I assumed there would be but i haven't seen anything that address' this specifically.
